songs.title: Have a Good Day
songs.lyrics:
I'm gonna have a good day
I’m gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good, have a good day
I’m gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day, yeah
I'm gonna have a good, have a good day

Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah
Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah
Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah, yeah
Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah

Why this lady with a puppy dog
3 kids, minivan, gotta cut me off
Why every time that I hit the mall
You gotta back me in there till I hit the wall
Why you on my tail, sir?
This is not what I'm prepared for
To get a scream and a swear word
God bless you right there sir
Uh, been up since 5:18
All I got in the fridge is some baked beans
God help me with my day please
They wanna break me down there till I straight scream

I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I’m gonna have a good, have a good day
I’m gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I’m gonna have a good day, yeah
I'm gonna have a good, have a good day

Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah
Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah
Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah, yeah
Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah

Even when I'm waiting in the line
Staring at the sky, stress waiting on the mind
So even when I'm barely getting by
The thing that I find, that you’re always on the time
So I'ma climb up a new way
Cause I'm reminded it's a new day
Feeling fresh like I'm putting on some new J's
New start, new heart in a new state
Even if it's cloudy on a Tuesday
And the routes that I drive is down to two lanes
Sun's coming out, I heard a blue jay
And that's just when you say

I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good, have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day, yeah
I'm gonna have a good, have a good day

So when it all goes wrong
I wrote this song
You could just say
I'ma have a good, I'ma a have good, have a good day
If it don't make sense
You're just so stressed
You can still be blessed
I'ma have a good, have a good day

I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good, have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day
I'm gonna have a good day, yeah
I'm gonna have a good, have a good day

Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah

Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah, yeah
Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah
